title: Ticket #2752: With ckpt_server in use, user log always reports not job checkpointed
description:
The test ./job_ckpt_stack_with_ckpt_server_std.run always fails on 64 bit machines on the 7.7 branch, but passes on 32 bit platforms. It works on 32 and 64 bit on 7.6 branch.

This test is a simple test of checkpointing with the checkpoint server enabled. It looks like it always takes two tries to get the checkpoint to the server, but the user log always reports "job exitted without checkpoint".
remarks:
2012-Jan-09 12:11:03 by tannenba:
Strange it works in 7.6 land but is broken in 7.7 land.... IPv6 changes to the ckpt server perhaps?
